stack:stack.stack:script: ZYPPER=/usr/bin/zypper $ZYPPER rr 1 2 3 for dir in /export/stack/pallets/*; do if [ -d $dir ]; then $ZYPPER ar $dir/*/*/*/x86_64 `basename $dir` fi done $ZYPPER clean --all

REPOFILE=/etc/yum.repos.d/stacki.repo rm -f $REPOFILE for dir in /export/stack/pallets/*; do if [ -d $dir ]; then repo=(/$dir/*/*/*/x86_64) echo [`basename $dir`] >> $REPOFILE echo name=`basename $dir` >> $REPOFILE echo baseurl=file:///$repo >> $REPOFILE echo assumeyes=1 >> $REPOFILE echo gpgcheck=0 >> $REPOFILE fi done yum clean all
